Name: Sapling
About the game: As the world's first spoken-word video game, Sapling packs a emotional punch in it's brief and metaphorical story. Sapling is a narrative-driven walking simulator game that tells the story of love, loss, and, hope - in not much more than 5 minutes of gameplay. With calm narration, an original soundtrack, and a unique writing style, we hope this heart-breaking tale can be a part of your life, story, and healing. Sapling has been described as wholesome, soulful, and kind - but maybe bittersweet is the right word
